title: JMP Workshop
text:
Prerequisite

Download and install JMP.
JMP download and installation information will come soon as we are still waiting for Rotman JMP Pro license for the 2023-2024 school year.
Note that the Rotman licensed JMP is Windows only. Mac users may consider installing a virtualization software such as Parallels Desktop so you could run Windows apps on a Mac. If you have any questions about the virtualization software, you may contact Rotman IT Helpdesk.
Get familiar with JMP navigation and basic use.

Launch JMP Pro. Take a quick 5-minute hands-on tutorial under the menu “Help > Tutorials > Beginners Tutorial”.
Go through 3 online video tutorials (about 50mins in total) at Getting Started for Academics. Note the datasets used in the tutorials can be found in JMP under the menu “Help > Sample Data Library”.

       Download and unzip the datasets for the workshop (data.zip).
